I'm thinking if we should override this class and add this method only in the inherited classs (i.e. MsalCppOAuth2TokenCache).
This way, we would be able to minimize exposing this to MSAL devs.
We can mark the original saveCredentials as protected.

timeline.bodyText: @kreedula It occurs to me now that we ought to add some thread safety around this API -- if a few different threads start calling removeRefreshTokenIfNeeded() simultaneously we're going to have race conditions writing/reading from disk (saving new RTs while writing deleting old ones)
